name: Open Restaurant !
description:
Open Restaurant is a fast-paced restaurant management game. Just as in most of many restaurant games, you need to seat the customers, take their orders, deliver their food, collect the bill, and clean the table. Do all of these actions quickly and efficiently to reach the daily target income to go to the next day. How many days can you manage?

Features:
Management and agility skills test
Nice music
Simple graphics
